definitions.definition: A swift, shallow part of a stream causing broken water.

( mining ) A trough or sluice having cleats, grooves, or steps across the bottom for holding quicksilver and catching particles of gold when auriferous earth is washed. Also one of the cleats, grooves or steps in such trough.
A quick skim through the pages of a book.
The sound made while shuffling cards.

main_definition: A swift, shallow part of a stream causing broken water.
secondary_definitions: ( mining ) A trough or sluice having cleats, grooves, or steps across the bottom for holding quicksilver and catching particles of gold when auriferous earth is washed. Also one of the cleats, grooves or steps in such trough.
A quick skim through the pages of a book.
The sound made while shuffling cards.

definitions.definition: In seal engraving , a small metal disc at the end of a tool .

main_definition: In seal engraving , a small metal disc at the end of a tool .
